data.title: Trymilestone.com
description: Start-Up company Front-End Designer.
Created UI page schematic design.

data.title: Website layout
description: Responsive boilerplate website that can be fully redesigned via RESTful API.
Created custom API server with Node.js.
Researched new front-end methodologies, paradigms, and designs - on popular sites - to create customized themes.
data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, JavaScript, Angular 11, Node.js, GIT

data.title: Trendy-Tendie
description: Mobile app that tracks and analyzes user sentiments (via Twitter and Reddit API).
Read and manipulate stock and cryptocurrency data via https://finnhub.io and https://api.nomics.co API’s.
Used Chart.js to display stock and cryptocurrency information dynamically based on screen orientation and user filters.
Created UI and UX wireframe designs and user story workflows using Lunacy.
Followed front-end development best practices by developing architecture before development.
Worked with a business analyst to enhance UX
data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, Chart.js 2, GIT, Ionic 5, Angular 11 (Front-end & API calls), Lunacy

data.title: Comfy House Mobile App
description: Created an ecommerce platform for an existing web application.
Functionality to CRUD products and categories.
Worked with responsive design in both Android & Apple mobile phones
data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, JavaScript, Ionic 5, Angular 11, GIT, Node.js

data.title: Comfy House WebApp
description: Responsive ecommerce platform with cart, category, and product capabilities.
API based front-end to allow for dynamic designs.
Worked with local storage and best practices on how to optimize UX.

data.title: Contact Manager
description: Responsive website to create, read, update, and delete contact information.
Ability to add new workers’ details and filter through data.
Get user data via Angular API calls.
Used Angular materials to create a clean and responsive layout.
